
=head1 NAME

reference

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - 
 attrs (hstore) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                    Table "gcis_metadata.reference"
    Column   |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  identifier | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  attrs      | hstore            |           | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "reference_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "publication_map" CONSTRAINT "publication_map_reference_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (reference_identifier) REFERENCES reference(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Has OIDs: no
